mapper.select: SELECT /* [user/user-mapper.xml] selectUser */ USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, ENABLED FROM TB_USER
SELECT /* [user/user-mapper.xml] getUser */ USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, ENABLED FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER /* [user/user-mapper.xml] updateUser */ ( USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, ENABLED ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{enabled} )
